title: Hillary Clinton Sexual Assault Page Edited to Remove ‘Right to be Believed’?
subtitle: A page about campus sexual assault on Hillary Clinton's campaign web site once included a reference to a victim's right to be believed, but the wording was removed in early 2016.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A page on Hillary Clinton's campaign web site about campus sexual assault was edited to remove wording about a victim's "right to be believed."
